00123 class LimitExceeded : public GigideException {
00124 
00125     private:
00126         T maxval_;
00127         T errorval_;
00128         std::string resource_name_;
00129 
00130     protected:
00135         const char* description() const throw()
00136         {
00137             std::stringstream sstr;
00138             sstr << "value for " << resource_name_ << " exceeded.\n"
00139                  << "allowed: " << maxval_ << " actual: " << errorval_;
00140             return sstr.str().c_str();
00141         }
00142 
00143     public:
00152         LimitExceeded(
00153             std::string resource_name,
00154             T maxval,
00155             T errorval,
00156             const char* file,
00157             int line) throw() : GigideException(resource_name, file, line), maxval_(maxval), errorval_(errorval), resource_name_(resource_name)
00158         {
00159             rewrite_msg(description());
00160         }
00161 
00165         T max_value() const throw() {return maxval_;}
00166 
00170         T actual_value() const throw() {return errorval_;}
00171 
00172         ~LimitExceeded() throw(){}
00173 };
